newsitem.title: USA: Reuters municipal bond index down 0.02 to 4.79 percent.
newsitem.headline: Reuters municipal bond index down 0.02 to 4.79 percent.

text.p: Reuters said Wednesday its 10-year tax-exempt general obligation bond index fell two basis points from last week to 4.79 percent from 4.81 percent.
Because the Thanksgiving holiday falls on Thursday, Nov. 28, the index was calculated Wednesday.
Normally calculated each Thursday, the index represents the non-weighted average yield on 15 state and local municipal bonds of 10-year maturity and ratings ranging from A-minus to AAA.

The issues are from Maryland; North Carolina; Texas Permanent School Fund; Columbus, Ohio; Fairfax County, Va.; Connecticut; Florida Board of Education; Wisconsin; Atlanta, Georgia; Shelby County, Tenn.; California; New York State; Pennsylvania; Dade County, Fla. and Tucson, Ariz.
